WORKING_SPACE_TITLE: Double click the working space you want
WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_ADD_TITLE: Input mode name you want to create
WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_ADD_TOOLTIP: Input mode name you want to create. This mode name will be used folder name
WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_EDIT_TITLE: Input mode name you want to modify
WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_EDIT_TOOLTIP: The modified name will be used in the folder name
%LblHelpMessage%: â€» Double click item you want
%TbxSearch_ToolTip%: Search by using a specific word
EPISODE_TITLE: Select the episode you want to apply
BOOK_ICON_TITLE: Select the book icon name you want to apply
CHARACTER_SKIN_TITLE: Select the character skin name you want to apply
PASSIVE_HELP: Some passives will not be applied. So, You need to check in-game
PASSIVE_TITLE: Select the passive name you want to apply
CRITICAL_BOOKS_TITLE: Select the Key Page name you want to load
CARD_ARTWORK_TITLE: Select the card image name you want to apply
CARD_ABILITES_TITLE: Select the card ability name you want to apply
DICE_ABILITES_TITLE: Select the dice ability name you want to apply
CARDS_TITLE: Select the Card name you want to load
%GlobalAddItemToListWindow%: Double click the item you want. If you want to remove the selected item, double click it
ONLY_CARD_TITLE: Select Only Cards your Key Book can use
DROP_BOOK_TITLE: Select books that drop Key Book
DROP_TABLE_TITLE: Select books that drop Combat Bookshelf
RESOURCE_DIALOG_TITLE: Selete image you want to add
DLL_WORKING_SPACE_TITLE: Double click the DLL working space you want
DLL_WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_ADD_TITLE: Input DLL name you want to create
DLL_WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_ADD_TOOLTIP: Input DLL name you want to create. This DLL name will be used in DLL, source file name
DLL_WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_EDIT_TITLE: Input DLL name you want to modify
DLL_WORKING_SPACE_TITLE_EDIT_TOOLTIP: The modified name will be used in DLL, source file name
%LblSourceCodeDescription%: Description for selected source code block
AUTO_CREATE_DLL_ERROR_1: The data of '{0}' column is not inputted
AUTO_CREATE_DLL_ERROR_2: The name of DLL to use is not inputted
AUTO_CREATE_DLL_ERROR_3: The name of the DLL you inputted already exists. If you continue, This DLL will be replaced. Are you sure?
